name: Raf R's Operation Application art Machine 2
name_original: Raf R's Operation Application art Machine 2
description:
Change variables with your sliders to create pretty moving pieces. hold down space and drag sliders with your mouse to change your equation as it draws itself. let go of space to pause and save (right click in canvas), change timescale to reverse or speed up and find pretty moments in your ever changing piece. press z to get a seed, copy it, press x to load, paste it, and see your favorite pieces load right back up to reanimate and toggle in real time. try new slider positions each time and you are sure to find a mesmerizing seed.

full download of all three machines containing instructions can be found here - https://mr-slitherz.itch.io/raf-rs-operation-aplication-art-machines
